title: China Xiangyang Urban Escape with Top-Rated Japanese Restaurant
description: Experience the charms of the ancient world when you explore Xiangyang from your base at Crowne Plaza Xiangyang, an IHG Hotel. Between daily excursions, stay in and delight your tastebuds at the three onsite restaurants. Fill your plate up at the buffet at Cafe 11 All Day Dining Restaurant, feast on authentic Sichuan and Cantonese dishes at Signature Dish Chinese Restaurant, and indulge in teppanyaki, sashimi and sushi at the mouthwateringly fabulous Taikichi Japanese Restaurant.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Xiangyang, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No.11 Changhong North Road, Xiangyang 441000, China
